2.text: 1) Sandriya's brother showed a magic trick. This is how he did it. Work in pairs and follow the instructions.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1) <break time='200ms'/> Sandriya's <break time='200ms'/> brother <break time='200ms'/> showed <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/> trick. <break time='200ms'/> This <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> how <break time='200ms'/> he <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> it. <break time='200ms'/> Work <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> pairs <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> follow <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> instructions. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Well friends, here's a new magic trick. Here is a glass of water. Can you see this? This is a paper bag. Pour water into this bag. Watch carefully. Empty the bag of water. Where's the water? It has vanished. Thank you. How did we do that?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Well <break time='200ms'/> friends, <break time='200ms'/> here's <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> new <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/> trick. <break time='200ms'/> Here <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> glass <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> water. <break time='200ms'/> Can <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> see <break time='200ms'/> this? <break time='200ms'/> This <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> paper <break time='200ms'/> bag. <break time='200ms'/> Pour <break time='200ms'/> water <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> this <break time='200ms'/> bag. <break time='200ms'/> Watch <break time='200ms'/> carefully. <break time='200ms'/> Empty <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bag <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> water. <break time='200ms'/> Where's <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> water? <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> has <break time='200ms'/> vanished. <break time='200ms'/> Thank <break time='200ms'/> you. <break time='200ms'/> How <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> we <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> that? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: We put a big sponge inside the paper bag!
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We <break time='200ms'/> put <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> big <break time='200ms'/> sponge <break time='200ms'/> inside <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> paper <break time='200ms'/> bag! <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: 2) What are the magic tricks that you know? Write the steps that you will follow to present your magic trick to the class.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2) <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/> tricks <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> know? <break time='200ms'/> Write <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> steps <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> will <break time='200ms'/> follow <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> present <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/> trick <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> class. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Venura read the following notice and wrote a note to Rajan.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='venura'>Venura</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> read <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> notice <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> wrote <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> note <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rajan'>Rajan</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: The Inventors' Club has organized "Creative Mind Competition" Age: 10 – 19 years Deadline: 19th June For further information contact: Mr. Nath Sivasundaran Teacher-in-charge (Science)
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> Inventors' <break time='200ms'/> Club <break time='200ms'/> has <break time='200ms'/> organized <break time='200ms'/> "Creative <break time='200ms'/> Mind <break time='200ms'/> Competition" <break time='200ms'/> Age: <break time='200ms'/> 10 <break time='200ms'/> – <break time='200ms'/> 19 <break time='200ms'/> years <break time='200ms'/> Deadline: <break time='200ms'/> 19th <break time='200ms'/> June <break time='200ms'/> For <break time='200ms'/> further <break time='200ms'/> information <break time='200ms'/> contact: <break time='200ms'/> Mr. <break time='200ms'/> Nath <break time='200ms'/> Sivasundaran <break time='200ms'/> Teacher-in-charge <break time='200ms'/> (Science) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
